hh3cStorageRef.name: hh3cStorageRef
hh3cStorageRef.contactinfo: Platform Team H3C Technologies Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China Http://www.h3c.com Zip:100085
hh3cStorageRef.description: This MIB define the textual convention of storage.

Hh3cStorageCapableState.name: Hh3cStorageCapableState
Hh3cStorageCapableState.description: An enumerated value which provides an indication of the capability state of a particular object. The value 'support' means the resource is enable to be managed, and the value 'notsupport' means not

Hh3cStorageEnableState.name: Hh3cStorageEnableState
Hh3cStorageEnableState.description: An enumerated value which provides an indication of the ability state of a particular object.

Hh3cStorageActionType.name: Hh3cStorageActionType
Hh3cStorageActionType.description: A control variable used to trigger an operator events, when read, always returns a value of invalid.

Hh3cStorageLedStateType.name: Hh3cStorageLedStateType
Hh3cStorageLedStateType.description: This object identifies the state of storage device's led. The value 'off' means the led is go out. The value 'on' means the led is on. The value 'blink' means the led is blinking.

Hh3cStorageOnlineState.name: Hh3cStorageOnlineState
Hh3cStorageOnlineState.description: An enumerated value means an resource is online or offline.

Hh3cLvIDType.name: Hh3cLvIDType
Hh3cLvIDType.description: A variable used to identifies the GUID(global universal identification) of the logic volume.

Hh3cSessionIDType.name: Hh3cSessionIDType
Hh3cSessionIDType.description: A hex string used to identifies the session between targets and initiators.

Hh3cWwpnListType.name: Hh3cWwpnListType
Hh3cWwpnListType.description: This object describes the format of WWPN(World Wide Port Name) numbers. An WWPN is a 16-byte Hex value. Separate the WWPN by comma if more than one WWPN is specified. e.g. 13af35d2f4ea6fbc,13af35d2f4ea6fad.

Hh3cStorageOwnerType.name: Hh3cStorageOwnerType
Hh3cStorageOwnerType.description: An enumerated value used in HA(High Availability) iSCSI target. The value 'spa' means the owner is the first storage processor, and 'spb' means another.

Hh3cExtendSelectPolicy.name: Hh3cExtendSelectPolicy
Hh3cExtendSelectPolicy.description: This object describes how to assign the storage space. The value 'differentAdapter' means select drives from different adapter/channel, system will look for space on another array only if it is on a separate adapter/channel. The value 'differentDrive' means select different drive, system will look for space on another array. The value 'anyDrive' means select any available drive, system will look for space on any array, including the original. The value 'none' means the way to assign the storage space is not specified, in this case the system will allocate the storage with the default criteria in the following order: 1. the storage from different adapter 2. the storage from different drive 3. the storage from any drive

Hh3cRaidIDType.name: Hh3cRaidIDType
Hh3cRaidIDType.description: A string used to identifies the raid's UUID(unique universal identification). e.g. c0a800a8-0000-07f5-0057-386e145eda44.

Hh3cSoftwareInfoString.name: Hh3cSoftwareInfoString
Hh3cSoftwareInfoString.description: A string used to identifies the information which software provided. e.g. [TARGET,LVM,DM] or [Both] or [3].
